channel.title: Issue: No icon in Steam list
channel.description:
HI, I searched everywhere and didn't found any similar problems.
There were never icon of Black Mesa on Steam for me. screenshot [url]https://i.minus.com/i8ejCQGkqV656.png[/url]
[b]BM[/b] was the first ever game in Steam account (except Source SDK) I didn't find any tricks for changing icon for myself.

item.title: Issue: No icon in Steam list
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
Things like this will be fixed once Black Mesa is released on Steam.

Read full topic
item.source: Issue: No icon in Steam list

item.title: Issue: No icon in Steam list
item.dc:creator: fuegerstef
item.description:
Steamworks?

Anyways, you could use this (or google for another “black mesa custom grid image”):

https://i.imgur.com/ZISi3.png
(Not mine, just googled it)

And then you might wanna rightclick on the empty Black Mesa image in the grid and look for “Set custom image” (it’s the second entry from the top).

Read full topic
item.source: Issue: No icon in Steam list

item.title: Issue: No icon in Steam list
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
It’s because it’s a mod and it doesn’t use steamworks.
